title: ReplyWithHeader Mail Plugin/Bundle's Changelog
description: Most recent changes with release notes and links to updates.

latest.title: Version 5.2 (2 enhancements)
latest.releaseNotes:
Version 5.2 (2 enhancement)
  • Added support for Mac OS Sierra
  • Adapted to Mac OS Sierra localization changes

v5.2-beta.title: Version 5.2-beta (1 enhancement)
v5.2-beta.releaseNotes:
Version 5.2-beta (1 enhancement)
  • Added support for Mac OS Sierra

v5.1.title: Version 5.1 (1 new feature, 2 enhancements, 3 bugs)
v5.1.releaseNotes:
Version 5.1 (1 new features, 2 enhancements, 3 bugs)
My apologies for delay in v5.1 release.
  • Support for OS X El Capitan
  • Honoring Email aliases too while reply-all on to list
  • Bringing Locale and GMT date format for header
  • Dutch translation update
  • Addressed issue of plugin hangs if Subject value is empty

v5.0.title: Version 5.0 (2 new features, 3 enhancements, 1 bug)
v5.0.releaseNotes:
Version 5.0 (2 new features, 3 enhancements, 1 bug)
Added donation options, support ReplyWithHeader.
  • Improved options and possibilties with RWH
  • Ability to add 'full raw headers' of email message (only in english)
  • Outlook Reply-All Parity with Apple Mail
  • Added 'Importance' header attribution
  • Improved 'Date' parsing & formating as per Locale
  • Header line spaces (before seperator, before header & after header)
  • Addressed an issue of Account Tab can't resize while in focus

v4.9.title: Version 4.9 (3 enhancements, 1 bug)
v4.9.releaseNotes:
Version 4.9 (3 enhancements, 1 bug)
  • Addressed unreadable chars in header
  • Correction of Russian localization string value
  • Initial implementation of sent date format as per selected language
  • Added donation options, support ReplyWithHeader

v4.8.title: Version 4.8 (2 enhancements, 1 bug)
v4.8.releaseNotes:
Version 4.8 (2 enhancements, 1 bug)
  • Improve handling of Blockquote Tag for Header attribution
  • Handling of Yosemite Beta 4 & Beta 5 internal Mail.app APIs changes
  • Email Subject prefix feature is not enabled by default, user can enable it on demand

v4.7.title: Version 4.7 (1 bug)
v4.7.releaseNotes:
Version 4.7 (1 bug)
  • Strange Behavior in v4.6 release (non-english and few english email content doesn't have header attribution)

v4.6.title: Version 4.6 (1 enhancement, 2 bug)
v4.6.releaseNotes:
Version 4.6 (1 enhancement, 2 bug)
  • OS X 10.10 Yosemite support added
  • Extra blank lines in Gmail.com and Outlook.com web clients
  • Installer fix - Check message framework for 10.7 & 10.8 only

v4.5.title: Version 4.5 (1 new feature, 1 bug)
v4.5.releaseNotes:
Version 4.5 (1 new feature, 1 bug)
  • Automatic Signature selection option for reply/forward email
  • Plugin Update Window Download Button Typo Fix

v4.4.title: Version 4.4 (1 enhancement, 3 bug)
v4.4.releaseNotes:
Version 4.4 (1 enhancement, 3 bug)
  • 'Norwegian Bokmål (nb, no)' locale support added
  • Resolved permission issue of Root user installing plugin
  • UI enable/disable sync issue updated
  • Feedback button click issue resolved

v4.3.title: Version 4.3 (1 new feature, 1 enhancement)
v4.3.releaseNotes:
Wish you a Happy New Year 2014
- Jeeva
Version 4.3 (1 new feature, 1 enhancement)
  • Implementation of From header label style
  • Handled header style implicitly for all mail clients, removed Entourage 2004 option from mail preferences

v4.2.title: Version 4.2 (1 new feature, 2 bug fixes, 4 enhancement)
v4.2.releaseNotes:
Spread The Word
Let Mail.app users know about
'Wonderful new face of ReplyWithHeader'
- Jeeva
Version 4.2 (1 new feature, 2 bug fixes, 4 enhancement)
  • Multilingual – plugin fully supports header attribution in 15 languages. [Deutsch, English, español, français, italiano, 日本語, 한국어, Nederlands, português (Portugal), português, русский, svenska, українська, 中文（简体中文）, 中文（繁體中文）]
  • Header attribution in choosen language regardless of system locale/language
  • Dynamic UUIDs processing, after every new version of Mail.app update. Simply, user have to do is to just run the installer of Install-or-Upgrade-or-Reenable.command to re-enable the plugin
  • Clean handling of forward header [From, Subject, Date, To, Cc], rest are suppressed from header attribution
  • Improved handling of line spaces between header and plain text message
  • Considering all en-* locale into one umbrella
  • Single quotes handling in labels
  • Latest MailHub Compatibility

4.1.title: Version 4.1 (1 new features, 1 bug fix, 1 enhancement)
4.1.releaseNotes:
Version 4.1 (1 new features, 1 bug fix)
  • Added fix: plugin breaks in non-english locale
  • Introduced new feature 'Remove signature for reply & forward' message
  • Outlook email address labeling is available to non-english locale

4.0.title: Version 4.0 (5 new features, 5 enhancements)
4.0.releaseNotes:
Version 4.0 (5 new features, 5 enhancements)
  • Added OS X 10.9 Mavericks support
  • Header typography: applies font, size, color to reply & forward headers
  • Brings Outlook Mail similar header functionalities/capabilities into Mail.app
  • Header Label [Date=>Sent, Names being used instead of email address]
  • Header Ordering [From, Sent, To, CC, Subject]
  • Outgoing Mail Subject Prefix [Re: => RE: and Fwd: => FW:]
  • Separator: Light blue thin line above header
  • Plugin completely manages Forward Header in Mail.app
  • Plugin will notifies user about new version availability & upgrade
  • Consummate handing of Plain Text email
  • Suppression of ‘Reply-To’ Label from reply and forward headers
